channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Loose drain cover, 29th October
item.description:
It has been reported to me by a resident that there is a loose drain cover along Mill Lane near the junction with Nightjar Road. It has apparently been ongoing for months and makes a bang every time someone drives over it. Please could this be fixed. Many thanks.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Nightjar Road, Brockworth, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Water gathers and creates obstructive puddle, 29th October
item.description:
The pavement slabs outside number 4 Windsor Street are cracked and concave. When it rains a huge puddle gathers outside number 4, which makes entrance a challenge. Lots of white crosses have popped up today (yesterday) so I want to make sure this issue is covered when people come to repair the pavement üôè
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5, Windsor Street, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Post or sign leaning slightly (less than 20 degrees) problem, 29th October
item.description:
Please pass to relevant ahr covering this area. As part of routine walked inspection, found leaning post on footway. There is slightly movement within foundations but not currently at risk of falling. This is located opposite school entrance. Please arrange for post to be removed and replaced.
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Post or sign leaning slightly (less than 20 degrees)
